definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: I am very happy to be playing with the Bianconeri jersey.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興自己能穿上黑白劍條衫，我感到欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: The 56 year old writer is said to be over joyed with winning the prize.
sentences.chinese: 這位56歲的老作家說她得到獎後欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: And I published it with great delight.
sentences.chinese: 我欣喜若狂的發表了這個理論。

sentences.english: Changchun and its majestic surroundings will put tourists on top of the world.
sentences.chinese: 長白山及其宏偉的周邊將會使遊客欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: People go into raptures at the mere mention of shopping.
sentences.chinese: 人們一提到購物就欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: I was beside myself with excitement and joy. Maybe this time, I could finally win.
sentences.chinese: 我欣喜若狂，也許這回勝券在握了。

sentences.english: People go into raptures at the mere mention of it.
sentences.chinese: 人們一提到購物就欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: One hot summer day, the boy returned and the tree was so delighted.
sentences.chinese: 一個很熱的夏天，男孩又回來了，老樹欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: The Greek press is in raptures after the opening ceremony for the Athens Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 雅典奧運會開幕式結束後，希臘媒體爲之欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: Fiona was over the moon when she learned she had passed all her final exams.
sentences.chinese: 菲奧納得知她已通過了全部的期終考試後欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: We were all cock-a-hoop about winning the first prize.
sentences.chinese: 能得第一名，我們每個人都欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: Jed felt wildly happy when he touched the horse.
sentences.chinese: 摸到馬，傑德感到欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: Barking wildly, she scrambled across the seat and into Nancy's arms.
sentences.chinese: 它欣喜若狂地大聲叫着，爬過座位，撲入南希的懷抱。

sentences.english: This year John was overjoyed by the Christmas season. He was becoming a man.
sentences.chinese: 今年對於聖誕季的到來十分欣喜若狂。

sentences.english: I'm totally overwhelmed with joy and sparkles and fireworks and everything which goes like bam, bam, bam, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是閃光和焰火，簡直讓我欣喜若狂了。

sentences.english: Ory is overjoyed at the prospect of seeing her.
sentences.chinese: 歐利欣喜若狂，期待著能見到她。

definition: to be pleased beyond one's expectations (idiom)/overjoyed at the turn of events
pleasantly surprised like mad (idiom); capering madly with joy/to express boundless pleasure
face light up with delight (idiom); to beam with joy
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
